client.client.parse_command¶

parse_command(command)[source]¶

Parse and respond to text commands from the user.

Commands

motor [int left] [int right] hello sleep front [int speed] right [int speed] left [int speed] back [int speed] stop tts [string message] image [“list”,”get”,”upload”,”display”] [string filename ()] internal [“single”, “continuous-start”, “continuous-stop”] external [“single”, “continuous-start”, “continuous-stop”] bladder [“inflate”,”deflate”,””] [int motor] [direction] [int distance]

Parameters:

command (str) – A human readable command

Returns:

A dictionary with the needed metadata to send to a marthabot

Return type:

dictionary
